title: Set alias for columns in dataset, but in expression builder, old column names are displayed when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the original column names are shown instead of the assigned alias names.
EB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the column names should be displayed using the assigned alias names.
SR:
1. Open the expression builder. 
2. Select a dataset. 
3. Double-click on the first column name. 
4. Observe the displayed name in the expression builder. It should be the assigned alias name instead of the original name.
